title: Kim Si-a
summary: Kim Si-a (Korean: 김시아; born May 6, 2008), is a South Korean child actress. She had notable roles in Miss Baek (2018), Ashfall (2019), Kingdom: Ashin of the North (2021) and The Silent Sea (2021). She signed an exclusive contract with Mystic Entertainment, in 2019. She has a younger sister, Kim Bo-min, who is a child actress.
